title: UzhikkALi
sahitya:
UzhikkALi naTanamADinAL ruddiran koNDa karuttura vENDi


anupallavi

  AzhiyEyum hAvenralari aLLi ulagai vizhungik-kumura


caraNam 1    kaDakaDavena iDiyiDittiDa gaganam bhuvanam naDunga
taDa taDavenak-kAlattErum sAittu vAzhkkai oDunga 
    caraNam 2    paDa paDavena panca bhUtam parandu yAzhil vIzha
shaDa shaDavena uyirgaL udira taNalum kOpap-pori terittiDa
    caraNam 3    mudiya ulagam muTRum ozhiya mUla shakti unnai 
pudiya ulaga mArga vEgap-puyal alaigaL vIsi taTTuk-
keTTu eTTu dishaigaLum takart tiDat-takart tinatOm ena
